<Text: Hampden Park (often referred to as Hampden) is a football stadium in the Mount Florida area of Glasgow, Scotland.>
Triplets:<Hampden Park
1:
--------------------
<Text: Hampden Park:  The 51,866 -capacity venue serves as the national stadium of football in Scotland.>
Triplets:<Hampden Park
2:
--------------------
<Text: Hampden Park:  It is the normal home venue of the Scotland national football team and amateur Scottish league club Queen's Park F.C. and regularly hosts the latter stages of the Scottish Cup and Scottish League Cup competitions.>
